name: Chomper And Pals World
description: Join Chomper And Pals in a new wonderful world of adventure! Play multiple new adventures starring Chomper, Mr. Radishpants, Evil Dr. Mouse, Dogenstein, and many more to come! Meet with some of Chomper's many friends and foes, along with some new faces from Chomper's world that have never been seen before! Take a break from adventuring and explore the world of Toonston while completing quests from Chomper's friends in World Mode!
